root: ^If the homeowner doesn’t reveal themselves by the end of the night, I might consider adding some of these to my own collection…

theft: ^Please don’t steal books from whoever’s library this is, Jean.
^All you’ll do is create more work for me later.
^I was only joking, my detective friend!
^I would never dream of making your job harder!
^Well, harder than it is with all this murder nonsense happening.
^I’ll settle for reading as much as I can before the night’s over, I suppose.
watching_out: ^I’ll watch your back, if you’d like.
^There’s a couple in here that I’d be interested in reading as well.
^Ah, not upholding the image of a virtuous law enforcer tonight, I see?
^Well, you know everyone has their flaws… and there are some rare copies in here.
^For all we know, this house might be abandoned, and all these books are just wasting away here.
^Delighted to see we have a similar thought process!
^I’ll begin sorting through ones for us to take at the end of the night, then.
